text.caption: TQ-UQ-1261001-09 Anti incrustante Sequestrante de H2S

caption.caption: Are you sure you want to perform this action?

animateColor.expression: If (({#1.Sts.Alarmado} AND NOT {#1.Sts.Reconhecido}) AND ({#1.Sts.Severidade} >= 251) AND ({#1.Sts.Severidade} <= 500)) Then 0 Else If (({#1.Sts.Alarmado} AND NOT {#1.Sts.Reconhecido}) AND ({#1.Sts.Severidade} >= 501) AND ({#1.Sts.Severidade} <= 750)) Then 1 Else If (({#1.Sts.Alarmado} AND NOT {#1.Sts.Reconhecido}) AND ({#1.Sts.Severidade} >= 751) AND ({#1.Sts.Severidade} <= 1000)) Then 2 Else If (({#1.Sts.Alarmado} AND {#1.Sts.Reconhecido}) AND ({#1.Sts.Severidade} >= 251) AND ({#1.Sts.Severidade} <= 500)) Then 3 Else If (({#1.Sts.Alarmado} AND {#1.Sts.Reconhecido}) AND ({#1.Sts.Severidade} >= 501) AND ({#1.Sts.Severidade} <= 750)) Then 4 Else If (({#1.Sts.Alarmado} AND {#1.Sts.Reconhecido}) AND ({#1.Sts.Severidade} >= 751) AND ({#1.Sts.Severidade} <= 1000)) Then 5 Else If (NOT {#1.Sts.Alarmado}) Then 6 Else 7
If {#1.Sts.Falha} Then 0 Else If ((NOT {#1.Sts.Falha}) AND (NOT{#1.Sts.Ligado})) Then 1 Else If ((NOT {#1.Sts.Falha}) AND {#1.Sts.Ligado}) Then 2 Else 3
